resources.string: Your Wishlist is empty, add amiibo by clicking on bookmark icon on amiibo details screen
Your Collection is empty, add amiibo by clicking \'add to my collection\' button on amiibo details screen.
Enable NFC reading in Settings and Tap amiibo to back of the phone to scan.

Amiibo Vault relies on your generous support for its continued development. If you enjoy using Amiibo Vault and wish to contribute to its future enhancements, kindly consider making a small donation to our team by purchasing us a coffee. You can do this by simply clicking the button below. 

Moreover, your rating of Amiibo Vault on the Play Store would also serve as a valuable contribution, providing us with vital feedback to adapt and improve our offerings. 

You can also eliminate ads entirely and enjoy Amiibo Vault without interruptions. 

Your invaluable support ensures we can continue to make Amiibo Vault even more enjoyable for all the Amiibo enthusiasts out there. Thank you very much.
Thank you for your support! Please enjoy Amiibo Vault
You can remove ads completely and enjoy Amiibo Vault without disruptions with Google In-App purchases. Thank you for support!
To enjoy amiibo scanning, please consider an in-app purchase. Thanks for helping us improve!
Are you enjoying the app? Your feedback helps us improve. Please take a moment to rate Amiibo Vault and share your thoughts!
